item.title: DjangoCon 2008 Panel: Django Success Stories
item.description:
Description

Moderator: Jacob Kaplan-Moss

Panelists: Matt Croydon, Michael Greer, Joshua Jag Ginsberg, Leah Culver, Andy McCurdy, Jason Yan
item.dc:creator: Jacob Kaplan-Moss

item.title: A Nice Problem to Have: Django Under Heavy Load
item.description:
Summary

"Don't prematurely optimize. Get your project to v1.0." This is a mantra often repeated in the Djangoverse. But what happens after v1.0 launch when your awesome site is being crushed by traffic? Scaling Django under load means finding bottlenecks, leveraging new tools, and customizing code. This talk will show you how it's done.

Help us caption & translate this video!

http://amara.org/v/FOPX/
item.dc:creator: Joshua "jag" Ginsberg
